user.title: Set up HAAPI
user.description:
HAAPI allows you to integrate REST APIs into Home Assistant.

After setup, add endpoints through the integration's Configure option.

abort.single_instance_allowed: Only a single HAAPI integration instance is allowed.
abort.no_endpoints: No endpoints configured yet. Add an endpoint first.

add_endpoint.title: Add API Endpoint
add_endpoint.description: Configure a new API endpoint. You can use Jinja2 templates in URL, headers, and body fields.

data_description.endpoint_name: A unique name for this API endpoint
data_description.url: The API endpoint URL (supports Jinja2 templates)
data_description.headers: Request headers in 'Key: Value' format, one per line (supports templates)

data_description.api_key: API key for API Key authentication (sent as X-API-Key header)
